EmailTemplate.subject: Thank You for Joining Pivotal at VMworld 2015
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
Thanks for visiting us at VMworld 2015. We hope you enjoyed learning how enterprises are adopting cloud native application architectures to drive modern software experiences for their customers.
During the Monday VMworld keynote, we announced intent to deliver Pivotal Cloud Foundry with the VMware Photon Platform as an integrated solution for Cloud Native Applications <http://blog.pivotal.io/pivotal-cloud-foundry/products/next-gen-cloud-native-platform-vmware-photon-pivotal-cloud-foundry>. This is an exciting moment for us—it signals an important milestone in the evolution of cloud technology. With this solution, companies will fundamentally transform how they deliver and run custom enterprise software for the next decade.
In case you missed anything, here’s a quick recap:
- Andrew Clay Shafer gave a talk on DevOps, Platforms and DevOps Platforms <http://www.slideshare.net/Pivotal/devops-platforms-and-devops-platforms-52304875?ref=http://pivotal.io/event/vmworld> - Cornelia Davis hosted a hands on DevOps lab on Removing the Barriers for DevOps <http://www.slideshare.net/cdavisafc/removing-barriers-between-dev-and-ops?ref=http://pivotal.io/event/vmworld> - Matt Stine delivered the VMworld Developer Day keynote on The Cloud Native Journey <http://www.slideshare.net/mstine/the-cloud-native-journey?ref=http://pivotal.io/event/vmworld> - You can get a full list of all our talks and presentations here <http://pivotal.io/event/vmworld>
We also launched a new online destination to begin your cloud native journey. Visit the Cloud Native microsite <http://pivotal.io/cloud-native> to learn why it matters, what it looks like and how to become cloud native.
Want more? Stay in touch with Pivotal and join the conversation on our blog <http://blog.pivotal.io/pivotal-cloud-foundry>, podcasts <http://blog.pivotal.io/podcasts-pivotal> and on Twitter <https://twitter.com/pivotalcf/>.
We hope to see you again soon at a future event <https://pivotal.io/news-events>!
The Pivotal Team
